profile:
Welcome to Huvan Construction. We specialize in exterior finishing and decks. HUVAN Construction has been providing quality construction services to Calgary and area residents since 2000. Built on a legacy of quality workmanship we take the approach that no job is complete until our customer is totally satisfied. From planning and permits through to completion let us help you with your next project.

***

Our Services: 

Composite and Wood Decks

Exterior Battens, Decorative Columns, Finish Trim Work

Framing Projects (Basements, Sheds, Garages, Additions)

Exterior Renovations

***

We are now serving a much bigger area including Nanton, High River, Claresholm, Strathmore, Canmore, Sundre, Water Valley, etc.


Contact us today to schedule your appointment. We're looking forward to working with you.
name: Huvan Construction

profile: With over 22 years of experience Elevation Renovations brings trust, quality and expertise to every project.  During consultation we examine your proposed renovation and come up with working solution's that are beautiful and serve the needs of you and your family. The estimate will break it down so you can see all aspects of your renovation with no hidden costs. No estimate it final as if you decided to make changes to the renovation we can do it quickly and accurately before the work starts. We pride on a tight communication line to keep you in the know how on all decisions before work starts. This is your home and we want you to have your finished renovation turn out the way you envisioned your space. Specialized in Bathroom remodeling, Pergolas, decks, Kitchen remodeling, Fireplace remodeling, basement developments and home renovations we have you covered. Check are website and online presence to consider us as your renovator.

profile:
Your Lethbridge Area home’s exterior needs regular maintenance, including Pressure Washing your home’s siding, gutters, driveway, and decks. If your home’s beautiful exterior is cared for by Super-Power Washing it will not only increase the look and the value of your home, but it will lengthen its life and you will avoid paying for major repairs in the future.

Basement Renovations - Full basement renovation services available. We can with the design services as well. 


Decks - We can take care of all your deck needs - permits, building, painting or standing to ensure you're deck is done right and on budget. 


Mon - Fri: 9am - 6pm​​
Saturday: 9am - 4:30​pm
Sunday: Closed

Covid 19 - We are following all the health and safety guidelines to ensure our customers and employees are safe.
payment_method: Visa, Mastercard, Cash, Cheque, E Transfer
